On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart editor-in-chief Alex Marlow will continue our discussion of President Trump’s first 100 days.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Dr. Kent Smith, President of Langston University, will discuss President Trump’s executive order in support of Historically Black Colleges and Universities.
The Heritage Foundation’s Rachel Bovard and Tommy Binion will discuss the current Congressional budget proposals and procedures to get one passed.
Cliff Sims, Special Assistant to President Trump, will discuss the president’s first address to a Joint Session of Congress on Tuesday night.
Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will discuss the national security content in President Trump’s address.
Dr. Smith was among the educators who met with President Trump on Tuesday for the signing ceremony in the Oval Office.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Congressman Mike Kelly (R-PA) will discuss his recent op-ed on a replacement for Obamacare.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
